Password was NOT updated because you didn't enter the same password twice.
Admin control for re-enabling Install Tool access

By clicking this button, a file typo3conf/ENABLE_INSTALL_TOOL is created (or removed if it already exists).
It unlocks the access to the Install Tool (password is still needed!) and will be removed automatically after 1 hour.
Create Install Tool Enable File
Delete Install Tool Enable File
